body:
Continuation of the comment.
strange since it looked like he was somewhat changing. 
Overhaul, in my opinion, it would have been better if the first character ended the series. Nevertheless, a good work.
6/10.

Day 11 - Manga 253* Once again the author did a good job, this sequel, however, in my opinion wasn't needed. While the last one told us that every action has a consequence, they were basically all useless since the dead girl came back, the girl that was supposed to be alive died and the main character is, once again, a close friend with the dead girl. The sequel told use, on the other hand, that destiny is inevitable and running from it will get you nowhere. I didn't cry and, even if the story was a little sad, some parts seemed kinda forced, like the self destruction made by the girl, from the last chapter and this one, I thought that she would learn that for her, he got a girl hospitalized, he refused to talk to anyone other than her and he fought some angels, she should Al known that she, and the baby, were the most important thing for the main character. Also, the quick change of decision from the father, from sending someone to the marriage to sending the girl to die, seems kinda
I know it just a hentai , it not real, but why am i crying ?

poster.username: L U M I E R E
